WorkItem.ClosedComment: Be aware of the Windows update agent is TOTALLY BROKEN in Windows 10 when it is set to check against a Wsus Server !!!!. Update Windows 10 to, at least, build 576.
WorkItem.Description:
I'm trying to update a client PC (Windows 10) through our 2012R2 WSUS server and I keep getting this error when trying to install a non-microsoft software using WSUS Local Publisher. 

Java installs but technesis doesn't.

Anyone got any suggestions?  Client PC is Windows 10.
